about_the_game:
Your Job

You're contracted by the startup company DEARAX to spearfish and trade to local market posts to make a profit. Conquer the depths of the ocean and upgrade your gear along the way in either a cooperative effort with friends, or a risky solo mission. 

While the job listing sounded good, the actual work experience takes place in a questionable environment. DEARAX doesn't take kindly to small efforts and measly work safety protocols. Rather, they're more interested in maximizing profits. Dive deeper into the ocean to find more exotic, but more specifically, profitable fish meat. Challenge the dangers and keep up with the companies demands to keep your job!

The Dangers

The depths of the ocean have been unknown ever since the dawn of time, and DEARAX is no exception to that. You'll be on the front lines of the great explorations of the sea, and possibly not making it back. You'll be forced to upgrade your equipment to go deeper, and battle extreme dangers of what lies beneath. Keep up with the demands of DEARAX either with your friends, or on a risky solo mission.

Do you have what it takes?

DEARAX didn't get many applicants for their startup company, but you were desperate for a job. Beggars can't be choosers, but on the bright side, you can explore the depths of the ocean in a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, and maybe even go down in history as the best spearfishermen!

Features & Gameplay

  • Procedural Generation

  • Wide Variety of AI

  • Extensive Progression System

  • Combat System

  • Spearfishing

  • Character Customization

Game Loop

  • Travel into the procedurally generated ocean

  • Go underwater to collect fish by spearfishing

  • Come back to the surface and trade the fish for money

  • Meet your quota

  • Upgrade, go deeper, and repeat!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains fantasy violence and may not be suitable for all audiences.

name: Untold Depths
short_description: A deep sea spear fishing horror game where going alone is deadly. As contract fisherman, dive into the endless abyss to harvest fish meat and fund your next descent. Beware the lurking horrors and try to make it back it one piece...
